channel.title: Docs :: Foxglove
channel.description: Core objects Table Facet - Defines logics for generating data for a specific table. Settings - Defines fallback generators by matching type of a column or customizing rules. Default Generators - Default rules defined by default DataSetting. Core packages Java package: guru.mikelue.foxglove DataGenerator - the abstract interface defining the operation to database. TableFacet - the abstract interface defining basic information of a table. ColumnMeta - The read-only object of columns' metadata.

item.title: Table Facet
item.description: Usage of TableFacet to control data generation for a table

item.title: Settings
item.description: Different level of settings to control data generation

item.title: Default Generators
item.description: Default generator for various types of columns
